attributes.action: In any further public vote on leaving the EU a WTO exit must be on the ballot.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is not about remain or leave, this petition is about the right that citizens have to vote in the in which they desire, without restrictions attached.
Revoke, Mays 'deal' and WTO exit are the only current tangible options the government, the parliment and the EU have given us and therefore none should be taken off the table.
Therefore, sign this whatever side of the debate you sit on, because I have faith that something we agree on as a country is a fair and proper vote.
attributes.background:
Leaving the EU has been a subject of much debate, and this level of debate is important as the topic is divisive, the infomation is plentiful and the consequences have high stakes.
This petition is not about remain or leave, it is about every citizen have a fair and proper vote.
